message: what are paypal alternatives for you guys ?

data.message: For receiving payment MoneyBookers - I didn't try it but I know some guyes received payment at it.
Western union,  payza,  payoneer, google wallet
Western union is the best option to receive payment actually. Also, Money Gram is pretty similar to weatern union. You will find its branchs inside Bank elqahera differnet branchs
Ahmed Hussein that's why i asked i thought something new happened :)
Yehya Hafez Western Union  requires moving out from the chair , an i am so laaazy :v
lol :D - Direct wire bank account transfer is the best :D
^ Well if you use your credit card to buy almost everything then you don't need to care about the each transaction fact, or just withdraw enough on each transaction. It's not a big issue :)
Amjad Hesham Mash'al I need to sell some licensed software that i made , i need to get money not to pay :)

Arabs Knight, I was working on www.concernedjoe.com and we had issues with PayPal, regardless of the fact that it wasn't an Egyptian guy holding the account, and everything was valid but their support sucks.

We used http://itch.io to circumvent that problem. The guy who made it is extremely helpful. I'm not sure of the payment methods but you can probably set a Payoneer account and have him sending the money to your Payoneer bank account which would be transferred to the credit card.

And nope it's far simpler than it sounds. You don't have to send Payoneer anything more than your national ID number and they'll send you the credit card. Once you start using it for some time they'll open a US bank account as well.

You can check out that page. https://account.payoneer.com/en-us/partners.aspx#usps
Moneybookers (skrill) for receiving is good and tried many times- free to send money to it and fixed amount to receive USD 3.69 whatever the amount
